message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its potential, I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?

Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is still my ideal price. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price of $10,000. I am willing to offer $9,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
